description: This file contains utility functions for testing React components, including rendering with context providers, updating URL hash, and clearing local storage.

methods.name: renderWithProviders(ui, { withAuth = true, withFavorites = true } = {})
methods.description: Render a React component wrapped with Favorites and/or Auth context providers for testing.

methods.name: setHash(path)
methods.description: Set the URL hash programmatically and dispatch a hash change event for testing hash-based routing.

methods.name: clearLocalStorage()
methods.description: Clears the local storage, useful for resetting state between tests.

ctags.name: renderWithProviders
ctags.pattern: /^export function renderWithProviders(ui, { withAuth = true, withFavorites = true } = {}) {$/
